Viral Penjelasan Muslim Korea Soal Alasan Daging Babi Haram
06 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: iStock/YouTube Daud Kim

Jakarta - Islam mengategorikan babi sebagai makanan haram, tapi apa alasannya? Muslim Korea ini menjelaskannya secara logis agar mudah dimengerti.Muslim tidak diperkenankan makan babi karena termasuk makanan haram. Hal ini juga telah tercatat dalam Alquran. Namun mengapa babi haram? Lewat saluran YouTube pribadinya, mualaf asal Korea Selatan bernama Daud Kim coba menanyakan pada Karam Kim yang tahu banyak seluk beluk Islam.Video keduanya diunggah pada 1 Agustus 2019 dan sudah ditonton lebih dari 1 juta kali. Namun lewat akun Twitter @syedlahhhh, netizen bernama Syed Safwan kembali membuat video itu viral. Kemarin (4/11) ia membagikan potongan pendek video Daud Kim tersebut. Kicauannya diretweet dan di-likes lebih dari 42.000 netizen.


Foto: YouTube Daud Kim

"Kenapa Muslim tidak makan babi?" tanya Daud di awal video. Ia menanyakan hal ini terlebih karena orang Korea banyak yang makan olahan daging babi. Karam menjawab, "Pertama saya mau bilang, jika Anda berpikir daging babi adalah makanan tradisional Korea, Anda salah. Nenek moyang kita berpikir negatif tentang daging babi. Ada pepatah Korea, "Babi berbahaya di musim panas"".Pepatah itu menyebut babi akan membusuk dan parasit tumbuh dengan mudah di dalamnya. "Itulah mengapa orang-orang tidak makan babi," jelas Karam. Pria berjanggut ini menambahkan, "Dalam 40-50 tahun terakhir, daging babi telah banyak dipasok, harganya murah sehingga banyak restoran daging babi dibuka (di Korea)."Sementara di Alquran, Karam mengatakan sudah jelas ada larangan makan daging babi. Alasannya beragam, ada yang mengaitkannya dengan budaya. "Mereka (orang-orang) mengatakan iklim Arab panas sehingga babi cepat membusuk. Tapi ini bukan jawaban tepat," kata Karam.


Foto: iStock

Ia melanjutkan, "Islam adalah agama untuk semua orang. Jika Anda memperhatikan kebiasaan babi, Anda akan melihat perbedaan dengan hewan lainnya. Misalnya, sapi atau kambing tidak makan rumput tempat manusia berjalan. Mereka makan makanan yang bersih dan sehat. Tapi babi itu makan kotoran. Mereka makan tikus dan ular, mereka bahkan makan kotorannya sendiri. Babi makan makanan yang terkontaminasi."Sedangkan Muslim hanya makan apa yang diizinkan halal, baik, dan bersih. Karam juga menyinggung soal larangan makan babi yang juga ada di Alkitab. "Jadi ini adalah pengajaran umum antara Alkitab dan Islam," sebutnya.Kalau babi haram dimakan, lalu mengapa babi diciptakan? Menjawab pertanyaan Daud, Karam bercerita soal bahtera Nuh. "Allah mengirim banjir besar ke dunia untuk menghukum orang-orang kafir. Nabi Nuh membuat kapal yang bagus untuk selamat dari banjir. Nabi Nuh menaruh sepasang makhluk bumi di atas kapal, babi juga ada di sana. Dan babi punya peran, mereka membersihkan kotoran. Babi memakan kotoran dari tubuh makhluk. Dengan demikian, babi berperan dalam ekosistem," jelasnya.


Foto: iStock

Setelah membahas babi yang haram, Daud juga bertanya soal miunuman alkohol. Karam berujar, "Alquran menyebut alkohol memiliki manfaat dan bahaya. Tapi keburukannya lebih besar dari kebaikannya. Karenanya alkohol haram."Ia melanjutkan, "Saat Anda minum alkohol, Anda merasa lebih baik dan berani, tetapi banyak orang tidak bisa berhenti di sini. Mereka terus minum, beberapa orang jadi seperti binatang. Mereka tidak bisa mengendalikan diri."Alasan lain alkohol diharamkan dalam Islam adalah untuk kebaikan tiap Muslim. "Untuk melindungi pikiran kita dan menggunakannya dengan benar karena Allah memberi kita akal pikiran. Saya pikir salah mengatakan minum alkohol bisa membuat orang jujur, ini budaya yang salah," pungkas Karam.

Viral Explanation of Korean Muslims Concerning the Reason for Pork Haram
Nov 6 2019, 09:45 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: iStock / YouTube Daud Kim

Jakarta - Islam categorizes pigs as illicit food, but what is the reason? This Korean Muslim explains it logically to be easily understood. Muslims are not allowed to eat pork because it is considered unclean food. This has also been recorded in the Koran. But why pork is unclean? Through his personal YouTube channel, a South Korean convert named Daud Kim tried to ask Karam Kim who knew a lot of the ins and outs of Islam. Both videos were uploaded on August 1, 2019 and have been watched more than 1 million times. But through the Twitter account @ syedlahhhh, netizens named Syed Safwan again made the video viral. Yesterday (4/11) he distributed a short cut of the David Da video. His tweet was retweeted and liked more than 42,000 netizens.


Photo: YouTube Daud Kim

"Why don't Muslims eat pork?" David asked at the beginning of the video. He asked this especially because many Koreans eat processed pork. Karam answered, "First let me say, if you think pork is a traditional Korean food, you are wrong. Our ancestors thought negatively about pork. There is a Korean saying," Pigs are dangerous in summer "". The saying goes that pork will rot and parasites grow easily in them. "That's why people don't eat pork," Karam explained. The bearded man added, "In the last 40-50 years, pork has been supplied a lot, the price is cheap so many pork restaurants are opened (in Korea)." While in the Koran, Karam said it was clear there was a ban on eating pork. The reasons are varied, some associate it with culture. "They (the people) say the Arab climate is hot so pigs rot quickly. But this is not the right answer," Karam said.


Photo: iStock

He continued, "Islam is a religion for everyone. If you pay attention to the habits of pigs, you will see the difference with other animals. For example, cows or goats do not eat grass where humans walk. They eat clean and healthy food. But the pig eats dirt They eat rats and snakes, they even eat their own feces. Pigs eat contaminated food. "Whereas Muslims only eat what is permissible, good, and clean. Karam also alluded to a ban on eating pork which is also in the Bible. "So this is general teaching between the Bible and Islam," he said. If illegitimate pigs are eaten, then why were pigs created? Answering David's question, Karam talked about Noah's ark. "Allah sent a great flood to the world to punish unbelievers. Noah made a good ship to survive the flood. Noah put a pair of earth creatures on a ship, pigs were also there. And pigs have a role, they clean the dirt. "Pigs eat feces from creatures' bodies. Thus, pigs play a role in ecosystems," he explained.


Photo: iStock

After discussing unclean pigs, David also asked about alcohol drinking. Karam said, "The Koran calls alcohol to have benefits and dangers. But its badness is greater than its good. Therefore alcohol is forbidden." He continued, "When you drink alcohol, you feel better and brave, but many people cannot stop here. They keep drinking, some people become like animals. They can't control themselves. "Another reason alcohol is forbidden in Islam is for the good of every Muslim. "To protect our minds and use them properly because God gives us reason. I think it's wrong to say that drinking alcohol can make people honest, it's a wrong culture," concluded Karam.
